OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Calculates and saves an assessment score.

childElements.name: UpdateQuestionScores
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "failOnStepError" : true, "internalNotes" : "", "isActive" : true, "chainOnStep" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "actionMessage" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : [ ], "id" : "", "additionalInput" : { "Id" : "%ResponsesFinal:Id%", "ResponseValueScore" : "%ResponsesFinal:ResponseValueScore%" }, "restOptions" : { "headers" : { }, "params" : { } }, "bundle" : "EDUAdmissionsUpdateQuestionScores", "sendJSONNode" : "" }

omniProcessElements.name: QuestionPrefs
QuestionResponses

omniProcessElements.name: ResponsesAndScore
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "failOnStepError" : false, "isActive" : true, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "mergeListsOrder" : [ "ResponsesAndWeights", "QuestionPrefs:Scores" ], "advancedMergeMap" : [ { "listKey" : "ResponsesAndWeights", "matchingPath" : "DeveloperName", "normalizeKey" : "1" }, { "listKey" : "QuestionPrefs:Scores", "matchingPath" : "DeveloperName", "normalizeKey" : "1" }, { "listKey" : "ResponsesAndWeights", "matchingPath" : "ResponseValue", "normalizeKey" : "2" }, { "listKey" : "QuestionPrefs:Scores", "matchingPath" : "ResponseValue", "normalizeKey" : "2" } ], "responseJSONPath" : "", "filterListFormula" : "Id != null && RawScore != null && Weight != null && MaxScore != null", "primaryListKey" : "", "actionMessage" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : [ ], "id" : "", "advancedMerge" : true, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sortInDescendingOrder" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "hasPrimary" : false, "internalNotes" : "", "postActionLogging" : "", "preActionLogging" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "dynamicOutputFields" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "allowMergeNulls" : false, "sendJSONPath" : "", "restOptions" : { "headers" : { }, "params" : { } } }

omniProcessElements.name: ResponsesAndWeights
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "failOnStepError" : true, "isActive" : true, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "mergeListsOrder" : [ "QuestionResponses", "QuestionPrefs:Weights" ], "advancedMergeMap" : [ { "listKey" : "QuestionResponses", "matchingPath" : "DeveloperName", "normalizeKey" : "1" }, { "listKey" : "QuestionPrefs:Weights", "matchingPath" : "DeveloperName", "normalizeKey" : "1" } ], "responseJSONPath" : "", "filterListFormula" : "Id != null", "primaryListKey" : "", "actionMessage" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "id" : "", "advancedMerge" : true, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sortInDescendingOrder" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "hasPrimary" : false, "internalNotes" : "", "postActionLogging" : "ResponsesAndWeightsEnd", "preActionLogging" : "ResponsesAndWeightsStart", "chainOnStep" : false, "dynamicOutputFields" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "allowMergeNulls" : false, "sendJSONPath" : "", "restOptions" : { "headers" : { }, "params" : { } } }

omniProcessElements.name: ResponsesFinal
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "failOnStepError" : false, "isActive" : true, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "mergeListsOrder" : [ "ResponsesAndScore" ], "responseJSONPath" : "", "filterListFormula" : "", "primaryListKey" : "", "updateFieldValue" : { "ResponseValueScore" : "=((RawScore * 100) / MaxScore) * Weight" }, "actionMessage" : "", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "sortBy" : [ "Id" ], "id" : "", "advancedMerge" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sortInDescendingOrder" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "hasPrimary" : false, "internalNotes" : "", "postActionLogging" : "", "preActionLogging" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "dynamicOutputFields" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "allowMergeNulls" : false, "sendJSONPath" : "", "restOptions" : { "headers" : { }, "params" : { } }, "mergeFields" : [ "Id" ] }
